verses.verse: (Maskil of David, when he was in the cave. A Prayer.) I <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H2199>aloud<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I <S%H2603>make<s%> <S%H2603>supplication<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
I <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him; I <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him.

When my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me, Thou didst <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H9350>path.<s%> In the <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2098>where<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> They have <S%H2934>hidden<s%> a <S%H6341>trap<s%> for me.

<S%H5027>Look<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H5234>regards<s%> me; There is no <S%H6>escape<s%> for me; <S%H4498>No<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H369>cares<s%> for my <S%H1875>soul.<s%>
I <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thou art my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> My <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H7181>"Give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> For I am <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low;<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from my <S%H7291>persecutors,<s%> For they are <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H553>strong<s%> for me.

<S%H3318>"Bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H4525>prison,<s%> So that I may <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H3803>surround<s%> me, For Thou wilt <S%H1580>deal<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me."
